metadata.name: Serendipity
metadata.description:
"The visual for this piece tells the story of the synergy of two contrasted characters as well as the evolution of cycles. The cycle begins in a more traditional manga style and becomes more modern and immersive as the sky changes. It represents that everything happens in cycles, but there is beauty to be found in each stage. The shooting star goes right through the eye lines of the characters reflecting the alignment in vision on this collaboration."
- pplpleasr

"The alignment in vision on this collaboration extends to the musical aspect of the piece as well, which sonically tells the story of two differing characters who come together in an aspiring moment to support each other through their journeys."
- Steve Aoki
